column2: Lockheed wins $431 mln contract for support work on F-35 WASHINGTON
column3: Aug 31 Lockheed Martin Corp  has won a contract worth $431 million to provide support equipment and services for the ninth batch of F-35 fighter jets

column2: M&T; Bank settles lawsuit claiming New York City lending biasM&T; Bank settles lawsuit claiming New York City lending bias NEW YORK M&T; Bank Corp agreed to upgrade its mortgage lending policies to settle a lawsuit by a nonprofit group that accused the large mid-Atlantic lender of discriminatory mortgage lending practices in New York City.  M&T; Bank settles lawsuit claiming New York City lending bias NEW YORK M&T; Bank Corp agreed to upgrade its mortgage lending policies to settle a lawsuit by a nonprofit group that accused the large mid-Atlantic lender of discriminatory mortgage lending practices in New York City. column2: Shareholder activism grows overseas as US market gets crowded NEW YORK/LONDON
column3: Aug 31 Activist hedge funds have launched more non-U.S. campaigns this year than any year since the financial crisis
column4: as managers slowly expand overseas in the face of a more challenging market at home.

column2: Swiss stocks - Factors to watch on Aug 31 ZURICH
column3: Aug 31    The Swiss blue-chip SMI  was seen opening 0.7 percent lower at 8725 points on Monday
column4: according to premarket indications by bank Julius Baer .

column2: Hulu to become Epix's streaming partner after Netflix opts out Aug 31 Major films such as Hunger Games: Catching Fire
column4: and Transformers: Age of Extinction will move to online video service Hulu from Netflix starting in October when cable network Epix switches streaming partners.
